humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were assessed and both were negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/1 for each node). Therefore, based on New Rule 11, the N stage is N0, as all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that axillary lymph nodes (2 sentinel nodes) were negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/2). Therefore, the pathologic N stage for this patient is N0.
